6877.title: This service does not track you

tosdr.case: This service does not track you

6878.quoteText:
Let’s keep things simple.

We could write a long winded Privacy Policy full of legal jargon and hithertos but we wanted to try to just communicate in plain english
6878.title: The terms for this service are easy to read

tosdr.case: The terms for this service are easy to read

6879.title: This service does not sell your personal data

tosdr.case: This service does not sell your personal data

6882.quoteText: If you want to opt out of this, enable the Do Not Track setting in your browser then we won’t count you.
6882.title: This service respects your browser's Do Not Track (DNT) headers

tosdr.case: This service respects your browser's Do Not Track (DNT) headers

6883.quoteText: That said, if we get something wrong or you feel like we’re not addressing something please reach out immediately
6883.title: User feedback is invited regarding changes to the terms.

tosdr.case: User feedback is invited regarding changes to the terms.
